module.description: This is top module of SVT Event Fabric

register.description:
Description
This register provides IP module ID, revision information, instance index and standard MMR registers offset.

bitfield.description: Module identifier used to uniquely identify this IP.

Standard IP MMR block offset. Standard IP MMRs are the set of from aggregated IRQ registers till DTB. 0: Standard IP MMRs do not exist 0x1-0xF: Standard IP MMRs begin at offset of (64*STDIPOFF from the base IP address)
IP Instance ID number. If multiple instances of IP exist in the device, this field can identify the instance number (0-15).
Major revision of IP (0-15).
Minor revision of IP (0-15).

register.description:
Extended Description
This register provides configuration details of the IP to software drivers and end users.

bitfield.description: Number of DMA input channels
Number of DMA output channels
Power Domain. 0 : SVT 1 : ULL
Number of Subscribers
Number of Publishers

register.description:
Digital test bus control
This register can be used to bring out IP internal signals to the pads for observation. 16 signals can be observed per select value.

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior
Digital test bus selection mux control. Non-zero select values output a 16 bit selected group of signals per value.

bitenum.token: All 16 observation signals are set to zero.
bitenum.description: All 16 observation signals are set to zero.

register.description: Output Selection for CPU NMI Exception

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved. Writing any other value than the reset value may result in undefined behavior
Read/write selection value. Writing any other value than values defined by a ENUM may result in undefined behavior.
